title: SOLD - T206 Graded and Raw: More Southern Leaguers Added

posts.post_title: SOLD - T206 Graded and Raw: More Southern Leaguers Added
posts.post_content:
Open to offers, especially if purchasing multiple cards. "I'll take it" takes precedence over any ongoing negotiations.

All prices are net to me and include shipping. PPFF preferred.


***UPDATED FOR  Southern Leaguers + removing sold cards***

T206 George Manion Southern League - Old Mill - PSA 2 - $OLD
T206 Pat McCauley Southern League - Piedmont 350 - PSA 2 - $OLD
T206 Bock Hooker Southern League - Old Mill - PSA 1.5 - NLFS
T206 Ed Reagan Southern League - Piedmont 350 - SGC 40 - NLFS
T206 Dom Mullaney Southern League - Old Mill - $OLD

Dode Paskert - Sweet Caporal 350/F30 - $50 NOW $42 NLFS


Please PM if interested.


Thanks for looking!
I’ll take Ames and Donlin fielding
If Mullaney is still available, I will take it.
